title: veeNa gaana
sahitya:
vINA gAna vishAradE! vara (vINA)
nAnAvidha rasa bhava pradarshita
(vINA)                


anupallavi

Anandamaya sunAdapriyE! amba
tAnam takita taka layagatylo velayu
(vINA)
                        

caraNam

kavi hrudayamanDu udamagu sindhu bhairavi rAga vinOdini!
vivida gatula vinyasamutO I
bhuvilO nI dhari cintincina vara

madhyama kAlam

kovidula celimi kOrina nAdu vinnapammu vinavE talli!
 (vINA)
